info.title: Chronoweb - OpenAPI 3.1
info.description:
This is the API description of Chronoweb based on the OpenAPI 3.1 specification.  Chronoweb is an open-source web information system that analyzes temporal information diffusion with a unified RESTful web service. Users are able to create, retrieve, update, delete, and traverse graph elements such as vertices, edges, vertex events and edge events. Furthermore, the server allows subscribing a specific vertex source with an incremental computation program. 

Related Article:
- [Kairos, IEEE TKDE](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10374549)
- [Time-centric engine, IEEE TKDE](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/9128046)
- [ChronoGraph, IEEE TKDE](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/8606161/)
